page.title: 03A LEISURE DAY
page.content: At the weekends during the Football season I like to go with my dad to the Elland Road Football ground to see Leeds United play.When we go we go in one of the boxes where you have to pay a lot of money.We try to go to every home match. It is good fun. When we score everybody stands up and shouts with excitement. At the end we go downstairs for a drink. If we have won we have a celebration. Sometimes we might go to away matches but only if these are played in Yorkshire or close to home.When we go away I always wonder what it will be like but it is usually like Elland Road. Most of the grounds look just the same.During the summer when there is no football I play cricket for Calverley Cricket Club. I am a wicket keeper and I also play in this position for school.
